subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: David Lee leads the Knicks in rebounds and field-goal percentage, but statistics fail to properly define Lee’s value, and there is no clever formula or high-tech abacus sophisticated enough to capture it.
snippet: David Lee leads the Knicks in rebounds and field-goal percentage, but statistics fail to properly define Lee’s value, and there is no clever formula or high-tech abacus sophisticated enough to capture it.
